titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that no portion of any benefit under a workmen's compensation act shall be treated as a Social Security benefit for purposes of the taxation of Social Security benefits.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 3/8/2000--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the inclusion of certain workmen's compensation benefits as social security benefits for purposes of gross income determinations.
